announcements.headline: Try any regularly scheduled martial arts class for free
announcements.body: Just try to let the instructor know you're coming & show up a few minutes early. ðŸ˜‰ See the calendar link below for class schedules.

announcements.headline: TRX is starting back up on January 3rd! Join us!
announcements.body: TRX class is a total body, low impact workout from 12:15 to 1:00 Mondays and Wednesdays.

announcements.headline: Fighting Fit launches January 4th!
announcements.body: Matt Clanton, Dynamic Defense & Fitness, is launching a combat-based fitness and self-defense class emphasizing calisthenics, kickboxing, grappling, sparring, basic kettlebells, and basic weightlifting to prepare students for the most common violent situations. Text or call Matt to sign up.
